Privacy Policy and Service TermsWe understand the importance of privacy protection. To fully present our collection and use of your personal information, we have revised our "Privacy Policy", "Service Terms", and "List of Third Party Information Sharing List" in detail in accordance with the latest laws and regulations. If you are under the age of 14, please be sure to notify your guardian to read our "Children's Privacy Protection Statement" together, and seek their consent and guidance before you use our products and submit personal information. Please read through the following terms and conditions before you use our products and/or services (collectively referred to as "services"). When you tap [Agree], it means that you have fully read, understood, and accepted the updated content. The key points are described as follows:
1.Make it clear that in the process of using the service, the information includes: 
1) The personal information you actively provide to us, which is used for account registration and management and submitting feedback.
2) The information we automatically collect from you, including mobile device information, usage, and logs, helping guarantee your account security and service stability. 
3) Basic information about smart devices and the information reported by them. 
2. Toprovide you with better services, we request the following permissions for the necessary scenarios:
- Location information: Provide you with location-based services, such as pairing and weather service.
- Album permission: Provide you with services based on pictures and videos. This permission is required to select pictures and videos from the album.
- Camera permission: Provide you with services based on the camera. For example, scan the QR codes to add devices, take videos for upload, and take pictures. 
- Microphone permission: Provide you with services based on voice control. For example, take videos and wake up voice assistants.
- Storage permission: Ensure the stable operation of the client. For example, start the app properly, save or read pictures and media contents.
- Notification permission: Send push notifications about products or services to you. Especially when you purchase specified services, an alert must be sent to notify you of the real-time status. 
3. Youcan query, modify, and delete your personal information. Your account can also be canceled to further meet your requirements. Please tap the link in the "Privacy Policy" to implement the specified privacy rights. 
4. We arecommitted to protecting your personal information. Without your consent, we will not share your personal information with any third parties. 
Tap to view"Privacy Policy", "Service Terms", "Third Party Information Sharing List", and "Children's Privacy Protection Statement". If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Thank you for your support and understanding!

After starting the automatic cruise control function, keep the throttle position unchanged for more than 5 seconds during riding. After hearing a long beep, you can release the throttle and the vehicle will continue to drive at the current speed. Pinch the brake lever or press the throttle again to cancel the cruise control. Please be cautious to turn on this function when driving into a residential area with a motor vehicle lane and a mixed traffic of people and vehicles.

\"When location changes (Beta)\" is our experimental feature. To use this feature, you must always allow access to your location. Your location information will not be used for any other purposes. This feature does not work without your location information. View \"Feature Details\" to learn more details.
Note: Above location conditions depend on your phone location. See Feature Description.

"When location changes (Beta)" is our experimental feature. You can set your location as a condition to trigger a specified scene. For example, "Automatically power off after I leave home". 

We will request the permission of "Always Allow Location Access", helping run scenes based on your location and provide a better user experience. This location is only valid for your current account, and your location information will not be used for any other purposes. This feature does not work without your location information. 

This feature relies on the "Location Permission" and the timely, accurate updates of the location of your smartphone. You will be solely responsible for any and all losses if your preset scenes do not run properly in case of failure to get your latest location as a result of denying or disabling location access, untimely or inaccurate location services, and other issues not attributable to us. 

For security concerns, when "At a preset location" or "Not at a preset location" is used as a trigger condition, a scene might not run successfully if your latest location cannot be obtained for 15 days due to disabled permission or other reasons. 

If you want to turn off this feature after use, just delete the specified scene.
